General.Name: SYN-Tech Chem & Pharm Co Ltd
General.Description: SYN-TECH Chem. & Pharm. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells APIs in Taiwan and internationally. It offers products in various categories, such as anticoagulant, attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, antihyperlipoproteinemic, antipruritic, scabicide, hyperparathyroidism, calcimimetic, anxiolytic, muscle relaxant, skeletal muscle relaxant, antitussive, anti-inflammatory, antipyretic, analgesic, antiemetic, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 inhibitor, anticonvulsant, antiulcerative, antihyertensive, vasodilator, anxiolytic, tranquilizer, bronchodilator, local anesthetic, decongestant, antispasmodic, antimigraine, overactive bladder, hvponatremia, and antiglaucoma agent. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 168 Kai Yuan Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 73055
